Hey Dark, Is there any way how to save multiplayer process? When I run game, join to any server, reach some lvls, then I go to menu --> click on Quit and everytime it crashes. Is it normally? Thanx for answer.

I click on .exe   the game starts but i get black screen with audio(Crysis 2 music playing in the background).It happens on 32bit and 64bit exe.

HELP!
I tryed to force my resolution 1280x1024 in system.cfg file but i still get black screen with audio.
For all blck screens, edit ur resolution on system cfg, the most important PLAY it WINDONED, and allow alt+tab. join our server on tunngle, server name 0800.forumbrasil.net
Quit the game with Alt+F4 and there will be no crashes
Dark: Game is always crashing if you reach some lvls & then leave the game. So, my question is STILL without answer. Is there any way, how to save multi. process?

To save multi process, start the game, click on single player, profile, create a profile , go back to multiplayer and ur stats will be saved in ur new profile, if the game is always crashing like u said check if u pc meet the minimum requirements and also update your drivers, video, chipset, etc
I have tried everything, but when I click on single player, profile, create a profile, it shows an error with creating profile "please choose a different name and try again". Any ideas?
Problem solved, THANKS DARK! (I forgot to run Crysis 2 as administrator.)
